page.title: 15FARMING IN ST.WENN AREA
page.content: There are 24 farms in our locality. Many are owned by one family or relations.There are about 14 families owning these 24 farms. {A FARMING BAR CHART 9 {beef 8 {beef dairy 7 {beef dairy 6 {beef dairy 5 {beef sheep dairy 4 {beef sheep dairy 3 {beef sheep dairy 2 {beef sheep pig dairy 1 {beef sheep pig dairy {-----------------------------------} There are some different kinds of animals.The main sort of sheep are a Devon long wool. The main breed of dairy cow is a friesian. At the farmyard where my Gramp works he has some sheep and cows and the farm is muddy.
